scripts.encryptfile: tsc src/encryptFile.ts -w --outDir ./pages/encrypt/ --target es2017 --strict true --esModuleInterop true --moduleResolution node
scripts.encryptstring: tsc src/encryptString.ts --outDir ./build/ --target es2017 --strict true --esModuleInterop true --moduleResolution node --module CommonJS && node build/encryptString.js
scripts.basic: tsc src/basic.ts --outDir ./build/ --target es2017 --strict true --esModuleInterop true --moduleResolution node --module CommonJS && node build/basic.js
scripts.testing: tsc src/testing.ts --outDir ./build/ --target es2017 --strict true --esModuleInterop true --module CommonJS && node build/testing.js
